Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Hello dear investors and users of Ethbits.  I want to congratulate you with past and upcoming holidays. I’m sure in the next year we will change your view of cryptocurrency exchanges. Let’s not distract you from New Year’s preparations and without further ado get to the business:  Ethbits Local:  We get a lot of feedback and suggestions about design improvement. We keep this in mind and next year the exchange page will get a fresh coat of paint. In January 2018 we are adding XVG and coupon system through which you will be able to get various bonuses on our website. Ethbits Local is steadily growing thanks to new users and cryptocurrencies.  You can always help us with promotion by sharing the information about our project in your social media. Because, as it’s well known, the best marketing is a recommendation from one user to another.  iTrade  Design is provided here – http://itrade.ethbits.com/.   Open your glass package like a New Year’s gift and see what we have prepared for you. All the date of iTrade launch stay the same. No delays. Closed beta is the middle of the spring 2018. Official launch is the middle of the summer 2018.  Thank you kindly for your attention and have a wonderful holiday season!  *We recommend to view iTrade page only on devices which have more than 1024px in width and fullscreen mode  Source 1: https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/946404654484779009  Source 2: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/12/28/christmas-update/

Author: winterrose
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: We would like to inform that the snapshot just happened and the airdrop was deposited in our smart contract according to what we told in our previous blog entry. READY TO CLAIM!  This quarter we will release 31,480.02 USD in ETH to the users as a result from indexing a very small proportion of the ICO funds as a thank you for the commitment. This ensures that during our times of development and optimisation the investors still can gain something.  At the time of delivering the airdrop we have just opened a position with a new Swiss based company which we are certain will be the future link between decentralised crypto and the banking system. Token holders can also look forward to future profits in TENX and we will ensure all the airdrops such as OMG make its way back to token holders.  The Ethbits Local Platform did not make any kind of significant profit so far in order to pay users because the low volume so indexing funds has proved as a buffer between nothing and a small return. Soon these times will be behind us and we will be not only paying dividends but expect to see a significant demand for our token. SEO services hired, ads, marketing and PR incoming and more interesting listing that will push the volume of our local platform. Volume is slowly increasing and we like to encourage our community to use our services, your own platform, to perform as many trades as you need. So as always your patience is always appreciated.  Our next step is ensuring we have an alpha version of iTrade available as early as possible in Q1 2018 and optimising the already functional Ethbits Local. Ethbits Local has a growing community in Venezuela (SEO, PR and marketing starting this next week), and the next target in the UK.  Instructions to claim your dividends are below. If you are not planning on selling your ETBS you can leave the your airdrop there and accumulate, they will go no where and they are linked to your own wallet. Just claim them before you move your ETBS to another wallet.

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: All the instructions below were taken from official https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/12/20/snapshot-airdrop-and-claim/ address and visit the original address to avoid any mistakes.    Snapshot, Airdrop And CLAIM!  Dear Ethbits community  We would like to inform that the snapshot just happened and the airdrop was deposited in our smart contract according to what we told in our previous blog entry. READY TO CLAIM!  This quarter we will release 31,480.02 USD in ETH to the users as a result from indexing a very small proportion of the ICO funds as a thank you for the commitment. This ensures that during our times of development and optimisation the investors still can gain something.  At the time of delivering the airdrop we have just opened a position with a new Swiss based company which we are certain will be the future link between decentralised crypto and the banking system. Token holders can also look forward to future profits in TENX and we will ensure all the airdrops such as OMG make its way back to token holders.  The Ethbits Local Platform did not make any kind of significant profit so far in order to pay users because the low volume so indexing funds has proved as a buffer between nothing and a small return. Soon these times will be behind us and we will be not only paying dividends but expect to see a significant demand for our token. SEO services hired, ads, marketing and PR incoming and more interesting listing that will push the volume of our local platform. Volume is slowly increasing and we like to encourage our community to use our services, your own platform, to perform as many trades as you need. So as always your patience is always appreciated.  Our next step is ensuring we have an alpha version of iTrade available as early as possible in Q1 2018 and optimising the already functional Ethbits Local. Ethbits Local has a growing community in Venezuela (SEO, PR and marketing starting this next week), and the next target in the UK.  Instructions to claim your dividends are below. If you are not planning on selling your ETBS you can leave the your airdrop there and accumulate, they will go no where and they are linked to your own wallet. Just claim them before you move your ETBS to another wallet.  1.Go to https://www.myetherwallet.com/  2.Click Contract tab (look the example image):    3.Paste this contract address 0x6822aaf4ab22e6cca8352a927b9ae0a8fdb58d9d in the Contract Address field (look the example image):    4.Go to https://goo.gl/DeDi1u and copy the whole text and paste that in the ABI/JSON field (look the example image):    5.Click “Access” and select claimDividendsAll from select a function box (look the example image):    6.Select the way you would like to use to access your wallet (look the example image):    7.Click WRITE (look the example image):    8.After you click WRITE you have to generate the transaction. You will be shown a screen with default values in. It is important you do not change these values and click GENERATE TRANSACTION, please wait until it generate the gas limit needed and the square turns green and shows you a number (look the example image):    9. You will then be given a TX id to track the transaction and that is your final step but incase problems with the network please keep reading.  The image below is just an example that shows you where to see how many ETH are you receiving, you should see 2 transfer when you claim your airdrop because the first one was the test deposit snapshot (look the example image):    10. Wait until the TX ID show the transaction as completed and you will have your dividends in your wallet address.    Once again we’d like to take this opportunity for thanking our community who have placed their trust in us, and maintained their confidence as we’ve working hard to provide our main start, ITRADE. We look forward to a bright future for the EthBits project and we are pretty sure that your patience will pay off!  If anyone is around please come visit us at The North American Bitcoin Conference, Miami 18-19 January or Coinfest, Manchester in the first week of April. Everyone is welcome to share their ideas and perspectives on the bright future that Ethbits will have in Crypto.  Thanks,  Kind Regards EthBits Team  Woot Woot!!

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: November Technical Update  Hello our dear users and investors. Just as I have promised in the previous post, every month there would be an update on our finished and future work. Let’s get to business.  Ethbits Local:   What do we have now on Ethbits Local: – 5 cryptocurrencies for selling, buying and exchanging: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ethbits, Monero, Onix;  – 239 countries, 78 payment methods, 169 fiat currencies which you can select while creating your offer;  – Site is available in 3 languages: English, Spanish and Chinese;  – We added 3 fields Headline,  Payment Details and Terms of Trade upon creating an offer for more detailed information for your future buyers/sellers;  – Added function “On Vacation” (on the page Settings -> Notifications), which allows you to deactivate your offer if you are not interested in trading at the moment.  – In modal sale window we added links-buttons for minimum and maximum so you can use them by clicking and not writing the data manually.    What’s next? – Improvements, improvements and again improvements. We are always open for constructive criticism and suggestions on improving design and logistics of Ethbits Local. We will be grateful if you leave your comments.  – Is 5 cryptocurrencies enough for p2p exchanger? I think not. In the near future we will add 1 minable coin and 2 ERC20 tokens.  – “New cooperations” – not empty words you heard from us in Telegram group. Which? Follow our news in social networks to be the first to find out.  – Redesign of the exchange page. Unlike other exchangers, we have p2p exchange crypto-to-crypto. Currently Ethbits Local is a hybrid of centralized trade and p2p platform. When you do something which doesn’t have analogies it’s always uneasy, BUT we have a few ideas which will make p2p exchange crypto-to-crypto easy and convenient for all the users.  – SMS notifications + online mode. Don’t want to miss a deal because you went out to make some tea? Easy.  – SEO improvements for public traders page.    iTrade: 1) Pre-registration for traders will be open in the beginning of January through our legal service;  2) Design of the exchange will be presented in the end of 2017;  3) ExchangeDB technology is in the stage of testing;  4) In closed Beta version there will be over 25 currency pairs;  5) UI of the exchange will be devided into 2 versions: for newbies and for professional traders, which would allow every user to Trade easily;  6) I often encounter the question about iTrade development process not being transparent. The answer is – iTrade is a half decentralized exchange. We cannot make our GIT repository public for security reasons. Design as I mentioned above will be provided by the end of this year.  Thank you all for your time. If you have additional questions or suggestions please write them in the comments below this post or in our Telegram channel.  Source 1:https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/934819739339288576 Source 2: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/11/26/november-technical-update/    Partnerships, Collaborations And Special Deal For Ethbits Users  Dear Users,  We are pleased to announce we are securing partnerships and collaborations with other great projects in order to hasten our growth. Not only have we been looking for other crypto related companies to join force with we have been also thinking outside the box and very close to securing a partnership with a UK sports betting company in order to allow users to not only copy trade but to place bets on cryptos. We have found an easy way to implement this and this will also prove disruptive to prediction and gambling sites so we will not be giving any more details until after launch. Another few projects we will mention and to show our support we will be giving back the full referral fee to people who joined because of this email. However please do not consider this investment advise and do your own research on the company before participation.  IGNITE RATINGS https://igniteratings.com/  The first company is Ignite Ratings based in Gibraltar which is the worlds first decentralised self – regulating investment intelligence platform powered by crowd source opinion. They are about to hold an ICO and we are very lucky to have been offered access to a private pre sale. Ethbits intend to integrate part of the platform in part of Ethbits iTrade to support the social trading aspect. Some highlights of this project are:  Great team which highly relevant experience. I have personally spoken with EVERY team member and can say they are solid guys with an amazing vision and impressive track record of execution. Innovative product which will solve many problems in the ICO space and really help the industry to self-regulate. Ignite is partnered with T ZERO of Medici Ventures – this will help bring massive exposure during the ICO. T-Zero is currently running the worlds largest ICO. EY (Ernst & Young) – one of the worlds larges audit firms will provide assurance services to Ignite and Ignite’s contributors by releasing a quarterly report on the use of funds. This is a very transparent and professional approach, not yet seen within the space. 50% of Ignite’s trading gains are distributed back to token holders. Great income potential. 30% of Ignite’s trading gains are reinvested into the Ignite MASTER INDEX, to maximise the potential for growth. Only 20% of trading gains are retained by Ignite. Low cap total sale proceeds are 17M- including the discounts. Total token supply is 15,000,000 with 5,000,000 locked for 24 months for staff incentives. Because of the partnership ourselves and community has been invited to a private presale  * You may email info@ethbits.com for the details. Ethbits will not be taking the 5% referral we will be giving it back to the investors so make sure you email us and we will send instructions.  * Ethbits is not be accountable for any loss of funds that are caused by attempting to or participating in the token sale in any way. We are not also giving you trading advice or saying these projects will give you a good return.     FidentiaX https://www.fidentiax.com/  FidentiaX is the world’s 1st Marketplace for Tradable Insurance Policies. The is very disruptive in the insurance industry and is set to have a great future. Do you know that your insurance policies is a tradable asset and that the tradable market is a multi-billion industry? In 2016, Singapore; Malaysia; Hong Kong; Japan and Korea surrendered policy value exceeded US$700billion.  Tradable policy has such HUGE potential market however there is NO recognizable marketplace for trading of insurance policies.  The solution is here, fidentiaX is building the World’s 1st Marketplace for tradable insurance policies by leveraging on Blockchain Technology. The team is helm by industry veterans with combined of more than 35 years of banking and insurance experience. The team is further enhanced with the strategic partnership with Blockchain Zoo (an association of Blockchain experts) to develop the platform.  Ethbits has agreed to list FidentiaX after the token sale has finished on Ethbits Local. To join the crowd sale and get the 5% referral fee back to yourself email us at info@ethbits.com.  * Ethbits is not be accountable for any loss of funds that are caused by attempting to or participating in the token sale in any way. We are not also giving you trading advice or saying these projects will give you a good return.  Regards, Ethbits Team  Source 1:https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/934818637403353089 Source 2:https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/11/26/partnerships-collaborations-and-special-deal-for-ethbits-users/    Excited to announce $ONX integration on @Ethbits! Trade ONX/BTC ONX/ETH ONX/ETBS ONX/XMR and ONX/FIAT locally at http://ethbits.com   Source: https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/934837797525114880

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Second Quarterly Airdrop  Hello our dear users and investors. As you are aware we’ve been working hard on Ethbits.com, our local P2P exchange and Ethbits iTrade. Striving to deliver the best product possible optimising the user interface based on feedback.  Once again we’d like to take this opportunity for thanking our community who have placed their trust in us and maintained their confidence as we’ve been working very hard to deliver the best products in a timely manner. We look forward to a bright future for the Ethbits project and growing our community in as many countries where crypto is traded.  As promised, We will be delivering our 2nd quarterly airdrop in ETH to the ETBS holders on December 8th 10pm GMT. As we do a snapshot to the Ethereum blockchain to know which ethereum address is holding ETBS and is empowered to receive their % of the airdrop and snapshot and airdrop deposit happens at the same time, it is critical, that in preparation for this event, you do the following before:  1. Close any outstanding ETBS orders on EtherDelta, Hitbtc, Coinexchange or any other exchanges before December 8th and make sure you do it before 10 pm GMT. You can buy more tokens to receive more % of ETH, but just if you buy and withdraw to your wallet before the snapshot, you cannot receive ETH if you buy ETBS after the snapshot.  2. Ensure that you hold your ETBS tokens on an Ethereum address where you own and control the private key. Please withdraw from exchanges.  3. Hold your ETBS token on an Ethereum wallet where you own and control the private key until the EthBits team has communicated that the snapshot already happened and you can claim your dividends, otherwise you may miss the snapshot and the airdropped ETH.  As an important reminder, PLEASE WITHDRAW FROM EXCHANGES to your wallet and make sure you hold your tokens in your wallet before DECEMBER 8TH 10PM GMT to be able to receive % of the airdrop as we said before.  Thank you all for your time. If you have additional questions please join our Telegram channel.   Source 1: https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/937382021424349184  Source 2: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/12/03/second-quarterly-airdrop/    CoinFestUK 2018 Sponsors  We are very pleased to announce that the venue for #CoinFestUK 2018 has been confirmed. CoinFestUK will once again take place at the Manchester Conference Centre @PendulumHotel. Sponsored by @EthBits @XgoxCoin @MonetaryUnit @Bitty_Bot  Source: https://twitter.com/CoinFestUK/status/935450091393028096   CoinFestUK 2018 Sponsors  Our list of sponsors for CoinFestUK 2018 is growing fast! It is amazing to see our sponsors come forward from our 2017 event to once again sponsor CoinFestUK, it shows we must be doing something right!  We have seen amazing support in just the last few weeks, below is a list of our current sponsors, we would like to say thanks for their support!  Headline Sponsor and Exhibitor: EthBits  Source 1: https://twitter.com/CoinFestUK/status/936222352312033280  Source 2: https://steemit.com/coinfest/@coinfestuk/coinfestuk-2018-sponsors

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Ethbits Development, October Update  Hello our dear users and investors. I very much thank you for your support. My name is Dmitry and I am the tech lead of the Ethbits project.  Perhaps everyone would agree if I say when you are really passionate about something – you forget about everything else. We’ve been so immersed into the development of iTrade that we forgot the most important thing – to keep you, our investors and users, updated on this whole development process.  I ask you people to forgive us for this omission. It will not happen again. Every month, (starting from today) October 25, we will be posting in our blog all the reports about our finished, ongoing and future work.  Now more specifically about work.  Ethbits Local: UI/UX  We have taken into account all the feedback and wishes of our users regarding the current design, and going to present you a new design of the project. I’m sure it will be equally handy for the experienced “cryptoworld” inhabitants and to the newbies. We will make 3 versions of trades: Buy – to buy cryptocurrency for fiat money; Sell – sell cryptocurrency for fiat money; Exchange – immediate exchange of cryptocurrencies between themselves. Sure you are going to like the simplicity and conveniencies of the new admin-panel.  XMR  At the moment of launching of the new version of Ethbits Local we will also add XMR. Which currency do you want to add next? Please write in the comments or in our group in Telegram.  Countries and currencies  We will expand the opportunities for creating offers for the majority of the countries and will add the option to use in dynamic formula the rates of different cryptocurrency exchangers or  currencies from coinmarketcap. Your rates could always be dynamically manageable according to the rate you prefer.  Limits  We are concerned about legality of our project, therefore any attempts to launder money through our service will not succeed. We have done our best to increase the limit as much as it is allowed by law. Perhaps some do not agree and ask why would I give out my data to this project? Answer is simple – verification of your identity and personal phone number is not a problem if you sell/buy cryptocurrency legally.  Favorites, avatars, notifications, best-search…  And many many other small improvements, that will help you to trade even easier.  All changes will be applied on November 13, 2017.  Ethbits iTrade:   A New Era  iTrade will be half decentralized thanks to ExchangeDB technology. Platform will be oriented on developers, traders and regular users. This technology will be entirely opensource and be using our own blockchain. We will introduce this technology in the beginning of January. Unfortunately I cannot uncover development details because me and my team need to discuss legal copyright questions and patent this technology. Only after that it will show up in the public repository GitHub.  User? Trader? Newbie?  iTrade will include: Exchange, Copy Trading feature and Social platform for trades. Regardlessly of your level of knowledge in cryptocurrencies – iTrade will give an opportunity to anyone who is willing to dip into the exciting world of trading.  When mooooon?  At this moment we have finished the basic functional of ExchangeDB, by the end of October we will finalize the visual part and design. Closed beta version – middle of spring, launch for public access – middle of summer 2018.  Security  We divide Web applications into 3 parts: legal service, main application and wallets.  Legal service – we will use our own application to verify the data (https://id.ethbits.com). Your data won’t be kept on the same server with main application.  Main application – access to the main server will not be made by ssh key or login/password. Hack from the outside is not possible.  Wallets – thanks to the ExchangeDB technology no one will be able to substitute the data about your transactions.  For now it’s all I can tell publically. All the list of technologies will be published on the iTrade landing page.    Pre-registration for traders and people who want to participate in closed beta tests will start after the publishing of legal service.   Sources:  https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/10/25/october-update/  https://twitter.com/EthBits/status/923263652584706048

Body: Dmitry Sergeev: Hello everyone! Today, as we promised, we're launching a new version of Ethbits Local. New design, new features. Official launch will be announced today on all social media and by email newsletter. The only thing we want to apologize for is that by today's launch XMR will not be available for trading because of desync and blockchain options. But such currencies as BTC, ETH and ETBS will go on working as before. Also I would like to point out that we added support of all the countries, 168 currencies and 78 payment methods. So anyone from any part of the world could create an offer to buy or sell cryptocurrency. Once again, thank you all for your support, we will not disappoint you. Stay tuned for the updates in the newsline of Ethbits.

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: EthBits Officially Launches P2P Cryptocurrency Exchange  EthBits, a peer to peer cryptocurrency exchange, is now fully live offering trades throughout the UK, France, South America and Nigeria. The platform includes payment via cryptocurrency, bank account transfers, and cash trades.  Ethbits is gaining popularity from users through its low transaction fees of 0.5% whilst also offering exchange via ETH and its own in-house token ETBS as well as bitcoin. The next coins expected to be available are Monero (XMR) and Zcash (ZEC) which focus on user privacy.  EthBits raised 13,786 ETH (worth $1.3 million at the time) from 820 investors in its crowdsale and has distributed 1.3 million ETBS tokens.  Matthew Radbourne, marketing manager of EthBits explained more:  “We’re very pleased that BCB ATM have agreed to make EthBits available through their network of ATMs. As cryptocurrency goes mainstream, there will be an ever-greater demand for convenient solutions such as ours.”  “The research shows that traditional cash and cashpoints aren’t going out of fashion any time soon. If we want people to use cryptocurrency, we need to start offering them solutions that are already familiar to them”  ETBS, the local currency of EthBits has recently been enhanced to reward token holders based upon the profit from the platform and also has a token burn function which will be utilized in the coming months based on the amount of profit generated through the platforms. 132 ETH was distributed to token holders in August with a further payment expected in January 2018.  Source: https://www.cryptoninjas.net/2017/10/06/ethbits-officially-launches-p2p-cryptocurrency-exchange/   Localbitcoins Competitor Ethbits Launches  To read the full article, you can follow the link below.   Source: http://www.trustnodes.com/2017/10/06/localbitcoins-competitor-ethbits-launches

Author: toygg
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Nope it is not possible. Let me quote what Cryptopia said to me on the 5th August.  "Hi Joseph.  Yes, I am sorry it has taken this long to get a final conclusion for you.  We have opened up the wallets so users can withdraw their ETB from Cryptopia and we will begin the delisting process.  rather then rehash the situation, I will actually just copy/paste the final email we have sent to the ETB team so you have it straight from the horses mouth so to speak  The Cryptopia Managers team have spent some time this week discussing the current situation with Ethbits and the future of trading Ethbits at Cryptopia.  While the CTO, was willing to discuss what would be needed to get ETB fully operational and trading on Cryptopia again, he was hesitant as there were concerns from the Dev team, that this could possibly open up an other issue having three different contracts coming into Cryptopia and the potential load on support this may cause.  The business team has estimated the cost of support for ETB to date at approximately $25,000, so including this cost with the potential future issues that concerned the Dev team, Management has decided that the best thing to do is open the ETB wallets and let users withdraw their coins.  We will permanently close the markets and regrettably will not consider another application from ETB at this time.  I am aware this was not the desired outcome, however we sincerely wish you and your team the best for the future of ETB. "

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Source: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/08/31/dividends/  Dividends, Get ‘Em All  Since the token sale, as an added measure and to secure a bright future for Ethbits, we indexed a small proportion of funds and as a result made some reasonable gains. We will publish these reports in Q4 of 2017 which will give more details in addition to reading the regular blogs.  This quarter we will release 50k usd in ETH to the users as a thank you for the commitment through the early teething problems that we are now overcoming. The other indexed funds profits have gone to aggressive security audits and hiring extra people in order to deliver our platform in a timely manner. So even from the token sale we have grown and we are still growing.  Our next target is integrating Ethbits Local to as many countries as we can while ensuring the development of iTrade is timely. During these months we have met some companies along the way and established strategical partnerships with. The official announcement of these will come soon. To claim your dividends you must have your ETBS in a non-exchange wallet (preferably MYETHERWALLET) and the instructions to claim your dividends are below. If you are not planning on selling your ETBS you can leave the dividends there and they will go no where. Just claim them before you move your ETBS to another wallet.  1.Go to https://www.myetherwallet.com/  2.Click Contract tab (look the example image):   3.Paste this contract address 0x6822aaf4ab22e6cca8352a927b9ae0a8fdb58d9d in the Contract Address field (look the example image):   4.Go to https://goo.gl/DeDi1u and copy the whole text and paste that in the ABI/JSON field (look the example image):   5.Click “Access” and select claimDividendsAll from select a function box (look the example image):   6.Select the way you would like to use to access your wallet (look the example image):   7.Click WRITE (look the example image):   8.After you click WRITE you have to generate the transaction. You will be shown a screen with default values in. It is important you do not change these values and click GENERATE TRANSACTION, please wait until it generate the gas limit needed and the square turns green and shows you a number (look the example image):   9. You will then be given a TX id to track the transaction and that is your final step but incase problems with the network please keep reading.  The image below is just an example that shows you where to see how many ETH are you receiving (look the example image):   10. Wait until the TX ID show the transaction as completed and you will have your dividends in your wallet address.   Once again we’d like to take this opportunity for thanking our community who have placed their trust in us, and maintained their confidence as we’ve working through these token related problem. We look forward to a bright future for the EthBits project that we all passionately believe in!  Thanks,  Kind Regards EthBits Team  Woot Woot!!      Hello, yes, it's a valid official announcement.

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Swap Success  To EthBits Community,  We have now completed the ETBS token swap.  Balances from the original ETB token contract (https://etherscan.io/address/0x807B9487aaF00629B674bd6d02E4917453bc5939) and the upgraded ETB token contract (https://etherscan.io/address/0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b) were taken as of block number 4190270 and combined to initialise the balances on the new ETBS token contract (https://etherscan.io/address/0x1b9743f556d65e757c4c650b4555baf354cb8bd3).  Going forward from this block (4,190,270), the original and upgraded ETB contracts will no longer be used for any purpose by EthBits and as such any token balances or transfers on these contracts will be ignored – only the new ETBS token contract will be recognised by the EthBits team.  The new ETBS token contract has the following functionality and features: 1. An ETBS token symbol – this allows us to cleanly list our new token on exchanges, starting with EtherDelta. 2. Based on the MiniMeToken used by a number of recent high profile ICOs with well-audited code and features. 3. Ability to query balances as of specific block numbers – this allows us to implement an easy profit sharing scheme for dividend payments. 4. Token burning functionality (currently turned off) – this allows us to proceed with our EthBits roadmap to add utility for the ETBS token.  Further details regarding the profit sharing contract will be communicated in the coming days, so we encourage you to keep a close eye on the usual communication channels for this and further exciting updates on the EthBits project. The approach we are taken is detailed in the Medium article: https://medium.com/@adam.dossa/dividend-payment-contract-based-on-minimetoken-90e5ba7c85d5  Once again we’d like to take this opportunity for thanking our community who have placed their trust in us, and maintained their confidence as we’ve working through these token related problems. Now that this is behind us we look forward to a bright future for the EthBits project that we all passionately believe in!  Thanks,  Kind Regards EthBits Team  Source: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/08/22/swap-success/

Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: The previous one was manual token upgrade, and it was anticipated that this won't work for the whole community and the team planned an automatic swap. With this swap, if you're a token holder, you'll be given ETBS tokens in 1:1 ratio, and the old tokens will be useless. Don't have any tokens in Etherdelta or Crptopia please, if you do so, please withdraw them into your own safe ETH wallet.  From the last blog post, we have this one below linked to the date question:  "We ask you to withdraw ETB tokens from Cryptopia and Ether Delta before the token swap, which will be implemented in about 2 weeks from today."  The release date of the blog post was 8 August 2017.

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: New Blog Post for ETB Token Swap and Dividends!  https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/08/08/etb-token-swap-and-dividends/  We will get more detailed blog posts regarding to the swap and dividens processes.  NOTE: It's your own responsibility to read the blog post to take the required steps. Please pay attention, folks.   ETB Token Swap and Dividends  Dear Investors,  We would like to thank you for your patience and update you with what is soon to come.  1. ETB to ETBS token swap.  We encountered an issue where not all investors have upgraded their tokens from the old to the new ETB contract. This caused issues with Cryptopia exchange, and paused trading for ETB.  We are going to resolve this issue by doing a token swap, the contract is already done and currently in audit phase. During the swap, old and new ETB tokens contracts will be swapped into a new token ETBS (new ticker). Nothing will be required from investors to do aside from having ETB tokens in a wallet that investors control private keys to. (Myetherwallet for example)  We ask you to withdraw ETB tokens from Cryptopia and Ether Delta before the token swap, which will be implemented in about 2 weeks from today. Cryptopia withdrawals are open for upgraded tokens and have been tested by Ethbits team, If you have any tokens missing on CRYPTOPIA from the old contract, which affected a few users, then the support at CRYPTOPIA should give these back to you (we don’t have access to their wallet), please contact them. As it stands we have no agreement to continue with CRYPTOPIA therefore we advise users should withdraw their tokens as soon as possible  Note: ETBS (new ticker) tokens will be listed on new exchanges and will be used to pay out dividends and fees in our local platform (same as before).  If you do not withdraw your tokens from exchanges you will be responsible for potential loss of tokens and dividends. Deadline will be announced shortly this week with a proper blog entry with every detail regarding this, you can start to withdraw from exchangers since now.  2. ETHBITS LOCAL  Our Local platform is in the final stages and NEW image is done and waiting for ETBS integration (swap contract) to be fully opened. We anticipate releasing the site by the end of August 2017. Shortly after, we will also release an official report which will cover our achievements, further look ahead and other relevant information.  Ethbits team will also be partaking in strategical partnerships and attending relevant crypto related events.  3. PROFIT SHARING  In August we intend to get the new token distributed and start paying back something to the holders of ETBS that has been made by indexing some of the ICO funds. Although Ethbits Local has made minimal profit during open Beta we have decided to release some funds (dividends) back to the community for the support, as we promised in the ICO. The profit sharing amount will be paid out to our investors and will be based on a snapshot, the date and amount will be announced property in a separate blog entry shortly.  Note: To get dividends you will need to have ETBS in the wallet that you control private keys to.     The ETHBITS team will remain at your disposal to clarify any doubts that may arise regarding this or any other situation.  Telegram: https://t.me/EthBitsChatroom Slack: https://evening-springs-46451.herokuapp.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ethbits Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EthBits/  Thank you for your time.  KIND REGARDS ETHBITS

Hello, I'm not the admin, but the upgrade process is very simple. What is the step you failed? Can you address me a bit? Please be more specific.  If you already upgraded and looking for to see your upgraded tokens in your MEW wallet:  -Once your wallet is open in the Send Ether & Tokens tab you can click Add Custom Token -Enter 0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b in the Address field, ETB in the Token Symbol field & 12 in the Decimals field. -From now on you’ll see the correct new Ethbits balance and can carry on transacting and trading like you were before  If you followed the steps and couldn't complete it successfully, let me know please.  Instructions Here: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/14/token-upgrade/  Current Status: https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/30/upgrade-status/

Author: Kubra Dam
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: If you already upgraded and looking for to see your upgraded tokens in your MEW wallet:  -Once your wallet is open in the Send Ether & Tokens tab you can click Add Custom Token -Enter 0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b in the Address field, ETB in the Token Symbol field & 12 in the Decimals field. -From now on you’ll see the correct new Ethbits balance and can carry on transacting and trading like you were before

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: We have hired a solidarity professional in order to stay with our token and we will have a solution to the current problem as soon as possible. We will present the solution within 2 weeks so try not be too disheartened with the current price or volume.  To briefly mention the Signature Campaign: Ethbits had a signature campaign to help promote the crowdsale on the Bitcointalk forum. When we started the campaign, we announced each post would be worth up to 0.9 ETB.  The price of ETH went up dramatically, and we decided to increase the signature campaign to 3% of ETB sold during the crowdsale. We DID NOT penalise early participants - we awarded everyone in a fair manner. When the crowdsale was over, we had approximately 47 participants, meaning the rewards were very high. To be fair to investors while not penalising participants, the translations were included and the figures can be seen below:    By modifying the original plan, this turned out to be more beneficial to the Sig Campaign participants and token holders.  All tokens not used will be burned and this will be mentioned in the Monthly report which will outline how many tokens we are able to burn per month (in other words by paying less Ethbits will not keep any more tokens). This means the token supply will continuously be decreasing, as originally planned, which is great for the holders. Thank you very much for your participation and we are planning a future campaign on Bitcointalk! Please check out our blog for an update to the current token issue but we will post the solution as I said within 2 weeks.

Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Dear EthBits Community,  Please take the last blog post published today serious and upgrade your tokens if you didn't do so. We would like to remind our users that have not yet performed the update process, that this is MANDATORY and the necessary guide to correctly update the ETB tokens is located here.  IF YOU DO NOT UPGRADE you are at risk of losing your tokens by sending them to an exchange.  CLICK for The Last Blog Post for Upgrade Status and Details  CLICK for ETB Token Upgrade Video Guide  CLICK for Token Upgrade Guide  The ETHBITS team will remain at your disposal to clarify any doubts that may arise regarding this or any other situation.  Telegram: https://t.me/EthBitsChatroom  Slack: https://evening-springs-46451.herokuapp.com/  Twitter: https://twitter.com/ethbits  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EthBits/  Best Regards.      The process and communication with Cryptopia is ongoing. As discussed with Cryptopia, we will be waiting for investors to upgrade 100% of the tokens in order to resume the market on that platform. Couple of minutes ago, a new blog post published by EthBits team. Please take a look at it.  https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/30/upgrade-status/  Quote from: privateclub1 on June 29, 2017, 11:14:32 PM This coin will be delisted  Take it as a loss  Please stop spreading FUD and take a look at the last blog post published minutes ago. https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/30/upgrade-status/  The current situation is to protect the investors and avoid possible undesired situations. There is almost no volume and one person is doing this on purpose. I don't know if you're familiar with Etherdelta, but it does not work like a real exchange and can be very manipulative. One could make meaningless "buy" and "sell" applied on his own orders there.  The old contract-based part of Etherdelta is will possibly be closed soon. The valid Etherdelta link is below and the lowest seller asks for 0.08 ETH (almost $3) per ETB and this real price is ABSOLUTELY not meaningless like $0.003 and so on.  https://etherdelta.github.io/#ETB-ETH

Body: There are 2 ways, first is once you have added the new ETB contract address on CUSTOM token, you will see your balance. Quote   Once your wallet is open in the Send Ether & Tokens tab you can click Add Custom Token – enter 0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b in the Address field, ETB in the Token Symbol field & 12 in the Decimals field. From now on you’ll see the correct new Ethbits balance and can carry on transacting and trading like you were before. And the second is Quote    To check if your tokens were correctly upgraded, just click HERE (https://etherscan.io/address/0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b#readContract) and paste your wallet into 9. balanceOf and click query, you should see your tokens below there, if not, repeat the process again.

Of course, getting listed on nice exchanges is another aim of EthBits and the team has already been working for that.  Quote from: Sharma on June 30, 2017, 10:39:56 AM Whats wrong with Ethbits price https://coinmarketcap.com/assets/ethbits/ I am scared.Is it due to some technical problem because coinmarketcap always shows wrong price of Ethbits or is it heavy dumping by devs?   The Devs has nothing to do with dumping on exchanges. They're decentralized and free markets which anyone can engage in. For coinmarketcap web site, the problem is they reflect the meaningless prices observed on Etherdelta exchange. I already explained the situation in my previous post. There is no market depth, furthermore, one could make meaningless "buy" and "sell" orders applied on his own orders there. This means the ETB price on coinmarketcap web site could be look like $250 or $0.003 as a result. This does not change the real value of ETB tokens.

Body: MyEtherWallet   1. Click Send Ether & Tokens 2. Enter private key 3. Click the button: Add Custom Token 4. In the Address field type: 0x4fE6Ea636aBe664E0268Af373A10CA3621A0B95b (upgraded contract) 5. In the Token Symbol field type: ETB 6. In the Decimals field type: 12 As soon as all the above steps are done, ETB tokens will be added for viewing and usage, and all the transactions made will be displayed   *** From my support chat with Ethbits *** however, nothing is being received in MEW. Any ideas?  Here's the actual link and it details two other popular Ethereum wallets which I've never looked at. https://docs.google.com/document/d/151NA7vxH30TQC0ezhKLTCLxfh6a7z37iKu4Ce0uMzmY/mobilebasic

Author: derekis126
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Please check my case, thanks.  https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/14/token-upgrade/#comment-51  I did the same faults like several guys before, I didn’t upgrade the contract but sent my old contract coins to cryptopia, they replied to me, please help me Ethbits team, thanks very very much.  —————————————————————————————————————————————  Ticket description: TXID: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1e28b38e1aef607173b58de3c2097f93a57696279b050817c02e7e4fadc3ca86  My cryptopia deposit addy: 0x9ac92fe76e6d8d240ef19432c9a6537544a6aa87  ——————————Their answer ———————  Hi XXXX,  This transaction was sent using the old contract, ETB has just moved to a new contract after being upgraded, refer to this blog post for information:  https://blog.ethbits.com/2017/06/14/token-upgrade/  Cryptopia has upgraded to the new version. You will need to talk to the ETB team to see what is required to get your ETB back. Their contact details are in the above blog.  Just explain to them that you sent ETB to Cryptopia using the old contract and they should be able to help. They have our contact details if they need to get in touch with us.  Thanks  fairlady  The Cryptopia Team  Admin reference : https://ethplorer.io/address/0x807b9487aaf00629b674bd6d02e4917453bc5939#pageSize=100

You may just need to recreate any orders that were deleted when trading was halted, and then you can carry on trading.

Author: xdookiex
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Etherdelta is pretty nice....its just I have a feeling that maybe the Gas transactions might be its eventual demise, if ETH continues to moon. It takes some getting use too, but Etherdelta very clean, and lean platform...  moving forward though, yes Etherdelta is pretty much the reason for low price, because its super niche, and the avg trader doesn't like a learning curve.  Basically, its a great place to pickup a bargain!  That being said, the price for ETB on the Ethbits site is listed @ $5 a coin....  When the dev has a suggested price for $5 and the coin is trading on Etherdelta for ~$2ish... you know what that means boys.  Easy double up.  This coin when it hits the bittrex will trade upwards of $5 dollars.  Based on ETH being $250 right now, each shares base intrinsic value should roughly be $2.50, however because extra tokens were burned... This creates valuation roughly 3.3x  So the fair price should roughly be around $8-10 dollars a coin. On top of that, this coin grants dividends!!!!!  True valuation will be reached on Bittrex within a few days.  Yeah need I say more? A coin that gives dividends and is under $10 bux, and allows you to own a shares in two separate trading exchanges.  Yeah.... Ethbits to the Moon. To all the sharps out there. Clean out the Delta while you can.  I called it first.  6/4/17  Don't believe me, just watch.

We will work continuously to get the site running and will start adding new sellers soon to participate. We will keep you informed about any progress in the coming days.  Regards, Ethbits Team.  For the latest information and instructions on contributing, please visit the website.  We will also be around today to answer any questions on Telegram, Twitter, and BitcoinTalk.  Join us in this financial revolution!

Author: Jayjay04
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Email received:  Dear Users,  Ethbits is currently working hard to integrate an Ethereum wallet on www.ethbits.com and starting the initial structuring of Ethbits iTrade. We do realise some people will feel uneasy with the silence but we are working hard to get the development optimised to deliver on time. We will be sending regular updates via email initially and when our team grows we will start a blog detailing all the current activities and short term goals. So far the token has been distributed and you can find these the following ways:  MyEtherWallet  1. Click Send Ether & Tokens 2. Enter private key 3. Click the button: Add Custom Token 4. In the Address field type: 0x807B9487aaF00629B674bd6d02E4917453bc5939 5. In the Token Symbol field type: ETB 6. In the Decimals field type: 12 As soon as all the above steps are done, ETB tokens will be added for viewing and usage, and all the transactions made will be displayed   MIST and PARITY: To see balance of an account you should do like this:  1- Go to Contracts Tab (If it is not there enable it in Settings) 2- Click Contract you already watch or add it then choose it. 3- Under balance Of click on address 4- click on address you want to see it's balance or enter it. 5- Click on Query 6- You can see it's balance without Decimal corrections there.  To transfer your tokens to another account you should do like this:  1- Go to Contracts Tab (If it is not there enable it in Settings) 2- Click Contract you already watch or add it then choose it. 3- Click on "execute" 4- in from account, Choose the account you want to transfer from. 5- in function to execute, choose transfer 6- in to address choose destination address. 7- in value choose the amount you want to transfer (Please pay enough attention to Decimals, Send very small amounts to be sure) 8- Click on "post transaction."   We are currently set to open trading of Ethbits Local 27th of May and so far you can buy and sell ETB on Etherdela exchange.  We will keep the community updated but we recommend if you want the latest info to join our telegram channel https://t.me/EthBitsChatroom   Regards,    Matthew Rodbourne  Tel: +33 (0) 65 13 31 457 mr@ethbtis.com  | More information ico.ethbits.com

Author: fn31759
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: I have invested in it but it looks like a 90% of scam.  After receiving the money almost no information on Ethbits side, which contrast with a message every hour during the ICO. I do not get it, as 2 millions USD is not such a big sum to escape with it and it breaks their careers in future. If they worked on the project, they could make x10 or x100 with fees and their token value increase as the project itself seems really promising.  Still out of 3 linkedIn profiles on ICO site 2 are still there (Monty Singh and Dmitry Sergeev) and 1 was deleted (Pedro J Rodriguez). I have the tokens on my MEW wallet and probably all of you have it (just need to add it as custom token manually) and yesterday they posted an info on Twitter.  I wonder that maybe there was some break in the team? Someone escaped withe the money and the other do not know what to do? Anyway if it turns out to be a scam (90%), for sure some people out of 820 investors live in Britain and Russia - if there is no any info on May 27th I would suggest going to the police.  If it turns out not to be a scam (10%), I think this lack of communication decrease the token value anyway, so the Ethbits team harms itself. I do not understand wasting not only my money, but their money as well.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Thank you all for your participation in the crowdsale it has been a confirmed success. We will now start security audits on the token and then upload the Eth wallet to Ethbits Local and go live in the UK. We will aim to do this as soon as possible. As agreed bounties will be paid on the 27th. We are working on a site support button but until then you can still catch us on the site chat ico.ethbits.com  Ethbits iTrade has already begun and we will be hiring extra developers in the coming months in order to stay on target. Again thank you for the support we will focus on building great platforms for the participants. We will establish a way to keep the participants updated on a monthly bases but in the mean time we will send emails to the subscribers on www.ethbits.com.

Author: muleroaa
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Yeah wondering this as well. I also raised concerns about the signature campaign manager (account seemed to be bought, e-mail + password recently changed). I had some not very pleasant DM's from this campaign manager. When asking the ethbits account if they would do something about this, they said no, they would not change the campaign manager. A few weeks later suddenly the campaign manager account goes inactive and ethbits account takes that role over, with no further explanation.  Also the incorrect use of English in all Ethbits related activity seems out of place as well, considering the guy in the interview that was given on Youtube seemed to handle his English pretty well, but I later found out that he is not even part of the team, apparantly he went to school with the CEO of Ethbits and he agreed to step up for the interview, because the actual team was too busy. Strange.  I think people will be up for a rude awakening, be it a total scam or just a project that is run by an absolute amateur team, can't really pinpoint it. Be careful.  This message will probably be deleted, even though I am just expressing my honest opinion. Let that be a warning too in case this happens.

Author: megashira1
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Wouldn't the ability to track top traders on the platform allow for large manipulation? If a top trader has a huge following he can safely take a position on a coin with the insurance that there will be others following suit and he can make some easy low risk profit. Subsequently his top trader status increases. Rinse and repeat mirroring effect. Seems ripe for pump groups to take advantage of this platform.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Lots of people think that it can be used for price manipulation but you cant. To gain a good enough rep to gain a huge following you will have to make consecutive good trades. So to do this for months and make a fortune why would you ruin it all to make a small fraction of what you have already gained by doing one bad trade. Its a good point though and the price manipulation has come up a lot but it is not an issue.  We just broke 1 Mill. things are going well and still lots of tokens to be burned.

Author: Kazadar
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: No you are forgetting to take the amount of tokens into account.  1% of 1,100,000 is 11000 tokens you need to own 1% of 4,000,000 is 40000 tokens you need to own to get the 1%  Using my example again  1,000 tokens out of 10,000 tokens with 40% profit share, that would make your share 4%, add a $100,000 revenue and you would be getting $4,000 in dividends Now if you own 1000 tokens out of 2500 tokens with 10% profit share, that would also make your share 4% add a $100,000 revenue and you would be getting $4,000 in dividends.  This is due to the fact that with a lower percentage of the profits, there will also be a lower amount of tokens, increasing your relative share of the tokens. With 1,000 tokens out of 10,000 you own 10% of the tokens, with 1000 tokens out of 2500 you own 40% of the tokens and thus will get a 4 times larger share.

Author: jenifive
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Quote from: ethbits on April 24, 2017, 07:33:13 AM Quote from: cabron on April 23, 2017, 08:23:59 AM  What about Exscudo, isn't that a centralized exchange like waves?  Quote from: BorisTheBulletDodger on April 23, 2017, 12:52:33 AM The founder and CEO are too busy to go on camera and instead send their slave "Matt" who's not even on the team manifest, to represent them on coin interview.  yup....legit.  Are Monty and Pedro camera shy?  Or is "Matt" being set up to take the fall?     Weren't they on the coinfest lately?  They took pictures of themselves, I saw it in this thread days ago.  Pedro's photo is on ico.ethbits.com he has met investors in person and Monty was at coinfest. Take what fall? We will be a successful exchange. If if makes anyone feel more comfortable I am sure Pedro would do an interview with FAQ. That may be a good idea. I will ask him.  Thank you for all the support we will keep you updated with monthly updates on our progress please sign up to our news letter on www.ethbits.com   Hello Ethbits!  Its very interesting how you answering to this guys questions but ignoring mine. Like they didnt exist...   Quote from: jenifive on April 22, 2017, 12:26:56 PM Quote from: ethbits on April 22, 2017, 10:26:55 AM  We are using the Ethereum Network mainly to use the profit share smart contract. Also we have found a company in Gibraltar where we can pay dividends without KYC so this is a major step in the right direction.   So you wouldn't really be needed a Ethereum Network if it werent a profit share smart contract? Thats the only feature why EthBits exchange will be using it?   Quote from: ethbits on April 22, 2017, 10:26:55 AM  We will grow slowly with closed and open Beta. We are fully aware of the potential risks and will avoid them at all costs.   If you will be growing slowly with closed and open Beta than why would you need such huge amount of money from investors to start an exchange?  Can you provide the exact list of costs on why would you need 400 000$+ for making a small exchange which it will be at the start?  If at some time exchange will become a little bigger, you will be starting to proof your credibility than you will be getting additional money from the exchange fess for growing. You dont need an instant huge budget without return which you will be getting from people on crowdsale.   Quote from: ethbits on April 22, 2017, 10:26:55 AM  We will be paying dividends in Ehthereum and we do not know the profit share yet until we have finished the crowdsale. It will be between 8% and 40%. Lets say we sell out and you buy 100% of the tokens which is 4 mill. If we  make 5k ETH per day then we distribute 40 % this evenly between the 5 Mill token holders every quarter. But remember we will have a decreasing supply.   How we can be sure that you will paying ALL the dividents that need to go to token holders? We should trust on your word?   Quote from: ethbits on April 22, 2017, 10:26:55 AM  We will be provably fair it is in out white paper. If you have a read we can answer any questions you have no problems.   Im sure you know whitepaper better than most of us. Imagine im an investor goes at the door of your company and asking you simple question. So the question is - Will you be providing a full quarterly-monthly accounting report on what is happening inside company? Will we see a provable list of money activity on spending the EthBits exchange budget? Will we see a total profit report on every month-quarter?   Quote from: ethbits on April 22, 2017, 10:26:55 AM  Polo make 1 Mill usd per day sometimes. If they used our structure it would not just be the core team who are rich. We are giving people a good opportunity. Start Up businesses are always a risk but we have an excellent team to make this happen. I think its an excellent and fair business proposition to buy the coin. WE did have offers  from angel investors but we prefer to let the community gain which in turn will give us more awareness and volume.   Centralized Start Up businesses are always at risk for investors and the creators. For the most part it is investors. In your scheme i dont see the part where EthBits team are risking. You are getting 100% of money from people for developing your project. If you will fail investors will lose money. You won't lose a single dime. You will go away and that's it. Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: 1. So you are guarantee that EthBits exchange wont get hacked ever in any way? That cold storage can't be hacked ever? That could't happen? Poloniex using cold storage and even they were hacked several times. What are the names of developers that already made another exchanges and what are the name of their exchanges?  Sergeev Dmitry but like what was mentioned he is under NDA and I can not say that. Also we never claimed we are hack proof but we will make security a very serious priority and limit any potential hacks. That is a given wuth any exchange really. All exchanges are open to potential hacks.  2. So your answer for my question is you are using blockchain network because you need to money for developing centralized exchange and there is no near any other reason why would you need to use particulary a blockchain? So if you had money for developing you wouldn't use ethereum network?  We are using the Ethereum Network mainly to use the profit share smart contract. Also we have found a company in Gibraltar where we can pay dividends without KYC so this is a major step in the right direction.  3. I'm sure Liqui will get bigger after some time and i dont see the reason why would some new exchange should be huge with a lot of users. If you are planning to start instantly like Polo with their volumes than you are risking to be hacked because a lot of hackers eyeballs will be watching your exchange. I think there is no reason to be in a hurry to become big because you should get enough time to get trust and credibility. I need the exact calculations what profit will token holders get if for example you will be having Bittrex month profit.  We will grow slowly with closed and open Beta. We are fully aware of the potential risks and will avoid them at all costs.  What profit will i get if i will be buying EthBits tokens for the current price in sum of 10 BTC.  I can not tell you that it would not be legal. But we will be having press releases in each country we enter. Also we wil be taking site fees in ETB and a new idea we have had is to burn part of the fees we take which will keep the supply constantly reducing. So we will maintain the desirability of the token constantly increasing and also have a constantly decreasing supply. We have made the token that will be 10 decimal places that is how confident we are.  For example: I will be buying 20000 EBTS. It is 0.9% of all the 100% total EBTS cap. If Exchange will be getting profit for 50k USD every day the token holders will be getting 1000 EBTS profits every month to my wallet.  We will be paying dividends in Ehthereum and we do not know the profit share yet until we have finished the crowdsale. It will be between 8% and 40%. Lets say we sell out and you buy 100% of the tokens which is 4 mill. If we  make 5k ETH per day then we distribute 40 % this evenly between the 5 Mill token holders every quarter. But remember we will have a decreasing supply.  Also will the exchange profit calculations be transparent and you will be making every month a thorough spreadsheet for investors? Or we will be trusting on your WORD that you will be fair and will give any exchange balance information? How also we could be sure that you will be getting correct data without any changes? Am i understand this right that your profit payments to tokens holders will be made by EthBits devs so we should trust you that your team won't scum anyone?  We will be provably fair it is in out white paper. If you have a read we can answer any questions you have no problems.  In total this is your business model? You asking for 100% of money from people without any return for exchange development. No one can be sure if you even make this glorious exchange. No one is sure if it will any good. No one is sure if it will not be hacked. And if at the end all will get well and you will finally release your exchange after a year or more for every 1 profited dollar you will take 0.6 cents for yourself and the rest 0.4 for all the token holders? What kind of fairy world are you live in? Do you think this is reasonable business model for people buying your coin?   Polo make 1 Mill usd per day sometimes. If they used our structure it would not just be the core team who are rich. We are giving people a good opportunity. Start Up businesses are always a risk but we have an excellent team to make this happen. I think its an excellent and fair business proposition to buy the coin. WE did have offers  from angel investors but we prefer to let the community gain which in turn will give us more awareness and volume.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: 1. Good question seriously it is good.  Well for the hacking part we are using a team of developers who know the concept of cold storage very well and I have mentioned it before that they have made an exchange that has never had any security problems. We will not be using smart contracts because we are not yet so confident enough. If we use standard well proven protocols with cold storage then the only security breach will be inside jobs and nobody wants to go on the run or go to jail. There will be no one with access to the code who is not well vetted and who has a equity in the company. It will not happen.  2. Rather than get Angel investors (most of them already have a piece of the pie in other exchanges) we are doing a crowdsale so to give everybody an option to get good returns. We can not legally sit her and say yes you will get rich but we are extremely confident we can take on the top exchanges with volume quickly. Also we will be utilising our token to partly pay site fees and also part of the fees we take in our token will be burned. So we will have a constant volume with a reducing supply. We could not do that with pounds or bitcoin and if we could then it would be nice to hear how we could.  3. I kind of answered this before. I would say Liqui is successful but only a hand full of people are gaining considerable amounts of returns. we are aiming high like Polo. You can call that rubbish if you like but we have the right team in place to do so. Polo makes sometimes 1 Mill usd per day. imagine 40% of that shared out to the people who believed in us from the start or even people who bought our token at 50 times the value from now. I am not saying we will do any of this I am giving you a scenario. If we sell out and we make 1 mill per day then we will pay out 400k USD per day to token holders that will be better than what liqui offers by holding your bitcoin. So what would you prefer a handful of people making all the money or a community  who saw an opportunity and grabbed it to share the profits. We are doing all the hard work all you have to do is believe in what we are doing. So your argument I do not understand.

Author: xdookiex
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: I would like to add, that these reasons mentioned up above are the very reasons ETHbits should exist.  Why can't there be a legit exchange that has its own token and rewards shareholders directly, that can be traded on any exchange freely.  Why are the profits from centralized exchanges only shared with only a handful of people?  Anything runs the risk of being hacked. It's common sense exchanges that have been around longer, have been more "tested". Again, if you have a lot of money in an exchange (that's your own risk), best practice is to not use an exchange like primary storage.  I think what a lot of people fail to realize, that a community of users is being created. The people that buy into this right now, will likely also trade on the exchange... So even on launch, there will be a group and community using this exchange.  The largest and primary reason poloniex is successful, is it's aesthetically pleasing & intuitive front end.  I use other exchanges, but really, besides 2-4 exchanges, most of my trades happen on 2. Poloniex and Bittrex.  I have accounts in BTC-e & Liqui, but those don't really get used at all.  My point is, the more people that get in on this, the greater the community, the greater profits for everybody.  Plus they said, they are going to use their own token as fuel, to pay for costs, and etc. So that would be a deflationary mechanism that will increase value over the long run of the token.  Plus they said something about dividends or staking. I mean like what more bells and whistles could you ask for?

Author: sergeevdms
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Hello, my name is Dmitry Sergeev and I'm lead developer in EthBits. A few years ago I was a part of development team on p2p exchange project. I signed NDA so I can't share you any information about code, project and names.  About security question: There are 2 types of hacking: hacking the entire network (for example - find and use bugs in blockchain) and exchange platform bugs and erros. For the first type - It will be not only Ethbits users problems, it will be a global catastrophe for each crypto users and exchanches. For the second type - My team is developing 100% secure and successful high-load projects for customers.  About cold wallets and Poloniex "hacks" - It wasn't "cold wallet hacks" their problem was in database structure and withdrawal daemon. Cold wallet is 100% secure if you follow 2 rules: 1 - If you send out a transaction from a cold wallet, it's not a cold wallet; 2 - If you create a cold wallet on a infected (hacked) computer, it's not a cold wallet.  I don't have much time, on unreasonable criticism of other projects, so if anyone want to discuss Ethbits with me - My contacts: Email: sergeevdms@gmail.com Phone/Telegram : +79315830735  Congrats everyone with our minimum goal.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: There is a base rate. This is between 7.5%- 40% based on how many ETH we raise. After the launch of Ethbits iTrade we will share 80% the 1st year and 60% the second year which then returns to the base rate (between 7.5-40%)  We have now reached our minimum funding goal so the project is 100% going ahead thank you for all the support! There is a few more days left to get tokens while the price is cheapest.  I had to delete a few threads because they were nonsense. Our development team have already made and exchange with ZERO security issues. They are also equity holders in the business.  Exciting times ahead and thank you for all the support so far!

Author: coinmenace
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: It is not 80% profit - it is "up to 80%" depending on the raised amount. if they only raised the minimum of 7500 ETH - then the profit share is only 10%. So be aware of it.  From the contribution terms and conditions:  Quote Appendix A - Profit sharing  Amount raised VS Profit Share  The amount of gross profit ETHbits will share is dependent on how much is raised during the Crowdsale. For every 1000 ETHER raised over minimum funding goal 10000 ETH Ethbits will share 1% of the gross profit.  Raised 10000 ETH or less - Profit (GROSS) share 10% Raised 20000 ETH or less - Profit (GROSS) share 20% Raised 30000 ETH or less - Profit (GROSS) share 30% Raised 40000 ETH or less - Profit (GROSS) share 40%

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Hi there we made the profit share proportional to the amount of ETHER raised in order to encourage investors to share Ethbits to their friends. Basically for every 1000 ETH we raise that is a 1% more profit share. So if we raise 10k ETH the site profit share will be a base rate of 10% but there will only be just over 1 Mill Ethbit tokens to share the profit amongst.  If we sell 4 Million tokens then we will distribute 40% of the site profit among 4 mill tokens. So the actual amount of dividends you receive should be the same regardless of 10% with 1 mill tokens or 40% with 4 Mill tokens. I hope I made that clear? If not then please say and I can try break it down some more for you in another way.         Quote from: DonApp on April 16, 2017, 08:30:33 PM I decided not to participate in this ICO, since the roadmap shows quite long times before developments will be finished. Moreover, limited ICO funds might slow down the process. I hope you will have a good ICO and will succeed with reaching enough funding!  Thank you for considering. We have set a minimum which will ensure our development will not be slowed down and remember we have Ethbits Local ready to launch next month that will start generating revenue. If we only sell 1 Mill tokens then that will potentially better better for the investors due to the reduced supply by burning unsold tokens. We will be sharing profits from the start and people need to buy them to pay site fees. That will be interesting indeed. All opinions are welcome though and actually appreciated because at this early stage we can easily tweek a few things if the opinions are good. For example we totally  restructured our ICO sale price and token issuance after listening to what the investors wanted. Good luck with your future investments and thanks for checking us out.

Body: You can buy Ether from www.coinbase.com www.kraken.com and www.poloniex.com.  When you buy never send your ETH from exchange to the ico.ethbits.com you send to www.myetherwallet.com (makesure you have your private key very very safe).   Then after the crowdsale the ETHBIT Tokens will come back to the private key you  have which can be opened using myetherwallet or imported into an ETH wallet like Mist etc.  If you go to ico.ethbits.com we have live chat all the time there.

Author: Kazadar
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Most of the coins that offer dividends would likely also be considered illegal in the US. There were lots of discussions on the topic last year after with the DAO, and many (but not all) did consider the offering illegal, as it offered a share in the profits. Also voting rights is many equal to ownership.  While there may be ways around the legislation, its often a easier to restrict US access rather than spending years on a court case.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: 1. I will now contact MyEtherWallet team and report the issue with their gas estimator giving wrong values and causing transactions to fail, so they can fix MyEtherWallet  2. I will change the crowdsale widget UI, so that it is particularly clear about this issue and warns users beforehand  3. I will write an email about the issue. We can send this email to all email addresses collected during the crowdsale. The message states they should check their transactions (instructions for etherscan) and resend the transaction in the case they were hit by the issue.  So will be fixed ASAP   Quote from: TheTruthIsOutThere on April 16, 2017, 04:44:30 AM Unlike most exchanges ETHBITS will be distributing up to 80% of the profit to the holders of the site token. Ethbit tokens will be used to pay site fees and the holders of the token will get paid royalties quarterly. Ethbit tokens will be spendable with the new mycelium card so our users can spend crypto anywhere in the world securely and with ease.    This will never get listed on Poloniex or Bittrex.     We will be partnering with new exchanges (already arranged) and competing against the ones you mentioned. Polo make sometimes 1 Mill usd per day. If they paid 40% of that back to token holders lots of people would be rich as opposed to the few people involved. Getting listed on Polo means nothing at all to us in the slightest. We will be their biggest threat.

Author: bits4books
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Some good features I saw :- ETHBIT  4 Mill tokens will be sold during the Crowdsale and all unsold will be burned2    Pool trading – We integrate with up to 15 leading cryptocurrencies, and by using trading forces major profits can be obtained by trading in the volatile cryptocurrency market.  Cold and secure storage of user funds - We alleviate the worry of hacking attempts with the use of cold and secure storage. Use your Trezor device to access and store your money securely, using two-factor authentication and other security verification methods.  Catering to inexperienced users – Our system allows inexperienced traders to copy the movements of those who are much more experienced. New traders can benefit from the expertise and knowledge of experienced market gamers. For users with no time to research trading, there will be the option to Auto Trade. Auto Trade is a feature that automatically follows the top traders based on their historical as well as present performance level. Auto Trade is the safest way of trading and will be implemented in the ETHBITS Investment Fund.  ETHBITS Investment Fund - We will provide a completely managed investment fund, based on the leading cryptocurrencies. Users can choose to invest without the hassle of knowing when to buy or to sell! We will base this in the top five currencies - users just decide how much to invest and for how long.  Advantages for traders – Traders who work in our platform have the opportunity of earning a percentage of their follower’s profit and obtain power-ups to gain certain privileges, such as reduced fees.  Credit Card Integration - A major feature of ETHBITS Local is direct integration with the new Mycelium card, which enables our users to spend their cryptocurrency easily and safely. The Mycelium card is a blockchain-based card and mobile wallet for payment management. Additional information on the Mycelium card can be found at:
