Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Things so far have been going well at Coinfest. One of the most interesting things is a potential partnership between Ethbits Local and a Bitcoin ATM company.           3% of all tokens sold so you will be happy if you are participating.  Quote from: DonApp on April 08, 2017, 05:31:16 AM Quote from: DonApp on April 06, 2017, 01:36:32 PM So I am a bit confused now. In the ANN it states '4 mill tokens will be sold during the Crowdsale and all unsold will be burned'. But later it says that '2 Million tokens will for 0.11-0.13 ETH during Token crowdsale' and '2 Mill tokens will be for sale upon launch of the site until sold for a fixed price of 1 ETH each' --> How many tokens will be for sale during ICO? 2 Million or 4 Million? Will there be a sale after ending of the ICO at a price of 1 ETH/ETB? I don't understand...  Furthermore; on the ICO website it says a price 0.1-0.13 ETH each, but here in ANN it says 0.11-0.13 ETH each? So what is the price during ICO, between 0.1-0.13 ETH/ETB or 0.11-0.13 ETH/ETB?    Any clarification on this possibly? Would like to know this before i can decide to participate in the ico or not.   Hi there sorry for the confusion. We did change to pricing structure based on the communities concerns. so the new price is:  Week 1 0.01 ETH per ETB 1st Week  Week 2 0.011 ETH per ETB 2nd Week Week 3 0.012 ETH per ETB 3nd Week  Week 4 0.013 ETH per ETB 4nd Week  If you find any information contrary to this anywhere please let us know. This is the price in the white paper.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: We are not counting on mycelium but if they are ready later this year we will make sure we are one of the 1st tokens. Incase this doesn't happen we are already approaching companies to explore the possibility of Ethbit tokens integrated in an app which uses NFC payments. If this is successful it will be approximately the same time away as we stated for Mycelium. With Trezors myetherwallet integration we now know users can safely store Ethbit Tokens so the priority is to be able to spend them.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Hi undertaking a project like this is a project in itself so there  would be no reason when other people are doing it. With some of the APPs we have seen you get token rewards for using them so it reduces the transaction fees to almost zero so is a great concept. So for now we will look get integrated into an existing application and concentrate on developing Ethbits iTrade.  Quote from: LLec on April 04, 2017, 02:59:22 AM The countdown clock says 11 days. So the ICO crowd sale will close then right? Alot of moving around of all the original threads are a bit confusing.  Yes we start on the 15th April so that's when we start not finish. We are updating the links where we can to avoid confusion.  Quote from: mkmdoc on April 04, 2017, 07:07:38 AM What happens everything is changed regarding signature campaign manager, threads etc. Is there any specific reason behind it, because I am little bit confusion about the campaign is still running? Author: LadangGalau
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: ethbits has explain it on the last post made in the old thread :   Quote For all the people who have doubt then please consider the following  1. Ethbits is a legally registered company with real people behind it that match with our core team. 2. ICOCOUNTDOWN does not list scams which is the reason why they are so popular (we are listed on there). 3. www.bravenewcoin.com and www.tokenmarket.net would have their reputations damaged if they were working with scammers. 4. The principle escrow is Fran from bravenewcoin so we can not just run away with money even if we intended too. 5. We have provided links to the team on www.linkedin.com in order to verify anything we have stated. 6. We welcome you to join us at https://www.coinfestuk.org/ so come and check us out in real life we can tell you and confirm everything face to face. 7. Our Lead Developer has an outstanding reputation on upwork and again would not jeopardise his company and reputation by working with scammers. 8. We publicly posted we are not part of ethbits.net before it was mentioned. They actually copied us before we went public so there must be a compliment there (the design for Ethbits logo competition was carried on bitcointalk which is where this 'leak' must have come from).    The team has discussed this and have decided to take action to stop the ridiculous claims by some of the users. How can they type of graphics used to determine the legitimacy of a project?  All the posts are deleted by admin when we report them but we have to wait for the admin on bitcointalk to respond and in that time we have legitimate potential investors visiting our thread and they do not need to trawl through all of this FUD just to get some information. We will have a moderated thread and we will not delete legitimate questions actually we welcome them! The person in the video, Matt, is helping out and is potentially going to be hosting the UK site for Ethbits Local. However he has a Job that is not crypto related therefore would like initially to keep low key. He may be at coinfest though with a few others so come and see for yourself. The CEO Monty will also be present so please if you can come and see us!

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Launch date is the 15th. Tokens will be available 2 days after the 4 week ICO. the 20% of tokens are not pocketed by the core team. 10% goes to running the platform (locked in escrow until Ethbits iTrade), 6% Marketing and PR as well as 4% to the core team but this will be held in escrow for 9 Months.  We already have a working platform www.ethbits.com and we will launch Ethbits iTrade in 2018 see the roadmap.

Author: ethbits
Title: [ANN] Ethbits Crowdsale (ICO) MORE THAN 13644 ETH RAISED !
Body: Yes we feel its better now. Its hard to understand why that would happen. Anyway we continue to make the 1st crypto copy trading platform. We will update the thread with this later today/ tomorrow:   WHAT IS ETHBIT TOKEN?   The ETHBIT token is a type of currency used to pay fees on the ETHBITS Local platform (for example to buy/sell Bitcoin, Ether and other cryptocurrencies).  ETHBIT tokens can also be used to distribute dividends to investors.  If you hold ETHBITS tokens, you hold a portion of our platform, and by holding a portion of our platform you are entitled to your share of a distribution of 40% of the platform’s profit.  The dividends will be paid on a quarterly basis . A total of 4 mill tokens will be sold and a maximum of 5 mill tokens will ever be in existence. The final number of Ethbits created will be determined by how many tokens are sold in the Token Crowdsale:  •   4 Mill tokens will be sold during the Crowdsale and all unsold will be burned . •   10% of tokens sold will be used to drive the platform Ethbits iTrade •   4% of the tokens will go to the core team and the remaining 6% will be used for Marketing and PR .  It’s easy to get started using an Ethereum smart contract and Ether.  Receive ETHBIT tokens from our four tiers rolling out over a four-week period starting at 0.01 ETH https://ico.ethbits.com.:   Amount raised VS Profit Share If less than 1 million usd if raised then the proportion raised will determine the % profit share. So the amount raised from 0 – 1 Mill usd will determine the % profit share from 0 – 40%. Everything over 1 Mill means the standard 40%.
